text: Soft-World is a games distributor/developer in Taiwan, based in Taipei, Taiwan. Founded in 1983 and now public, Soft-World currently focuses on MMORPG operation in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau, Southeast Asia. It is the largest games software company in Taiwan. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 establishments in Taiwan Category:Companies based in Taipei Category:Companies established in 1983 Category:Video game development companies Category:Video game publishers Category:Video game companies of Taiwan Category:Software companies of Taiwan
title: Soft-World
